@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <hu>.
After editing this file, you can run 'flutter pub run slang apply --locale=hu' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

notAvailableOnPlatform.title: Not available
notAvailableOnPlatform.content: This feature is only available on:

sendModeHelp.title: Send modes
sendModeHelp.single: Sends files to one recipient. Selection will be cleared after finished file transfer.
sendModeHelp.multiple: Sends files to multiple recipients. Selection will not be cleared.
sendModeHelp.link: Recipients who do not have LocalSend installed can download the selected files by opening the link in their browser.
